summary: This document contains a series of bank statements for Laurel, Inc., detailing account transactions, including deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and ending balances over several months in 2012 and 2013. The statements reflect the financial activities of the account, including significant incoming wire transfers and service charges. This document contains a series of bank statements for Laurel, Inc., detailing account balances, deposits, and withdrawals over several months in 2014 and early 2016. It highlights significant transactions, including a large deposit and various fees associated with the account. This document contains various statements of account for Laurel, Inc. at First Bank, detailing transactions, balances, and instructions for verifying account balances. The statements cover multiple months in 2015, showing consistent ending balances and a check transaction on July 1, 2015. This document contains various bank statements and check images related to an account held by Laurel, Inc. in St. Thomas, VI. It details account balances, transactions, and instructions for reconciling the account, highlighting a significant incoming wire transfer of $165,000.00 on 10/16/2015. This document contains a series of bank statements for an account held by Laurel, Inc. at First Bank, detailing transactions from December 2015 to June 2016. The statements include information on balances, deposits, and withdrawals, as well as instructions for reconciling the account. The document is marked as confidential and includes various disclaimers regarding electronic funds transfers and account management. This document contains a series of bank statements for Laurel, Inc., detailing account balances, transactions, and instructions for reconciling checkbook balances. The statements cover various dates in 2016 and include information about deposits, service charges, and daily balance information. This document contains a series of bank statements from First Bank for Laurel, Inc., detailing account balances, transactions, and instructions for balancing the statement. The statements cover various dates in 2016 and 2017, showing consistent balances and minimal activity, primarily service charges and a single check transaction. This document contains a series of bank statements for Laurel, Inc., detailing account balances, deposits, and withdrawals over several months in 2017 and 2018. The statements highlight transactions including incoming wires and ACH debits, with a focus on maintaining accurate records for the account. This document contains a series of bank statements for Laurel, Inc., detailing account balances, transactions, and instructions for handling errors or questions regarding electronic transfers. The statements cover various dates in 2018 and 2019, showing deposits, withdrawals, and service charges.
